name: Dirt Bike Stunt Race-r Game 3D
description:
Play the most exciting bike stunt game on the App Store. In this Moto Bike Racing Game you will have to select your Heavy Bike or Sports Bike to perform stunts on Impossible Tricky Tracks. Be aware of all obstacles on the vertical ramps. Ride carefully on your high speed bike so that you don’t crash which will results in failure of your mission.
In this game you will face multiple mode i-e Stunt Mode, High Speed Racing Mode, Campaign Mode and Racing Against your Rivals. Every mode is more interesting than the other one. Download the best Bike Stunt Game and keep enjoy your life.

Features:
Stunning 3D graphics
Multiple Game Modes
Eye Catching User Interface
Smooth and Multiple Control
Off-road Riding and Impossible Ramps
Many Bike to choose from
Many Challenging Levels
